pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sample Size and Post-Hoc Power of Association Studies Involving Mitochondrial DNA Haplogroups // Calculate Sample Size and Post-Hoc Power of Association Studies Involving Mitochondrial DNA Haplogroups. Based on formulae by Samuels et al. AJHG, 2006. 78(4):713-720. DOI:10.1086/502682.
